synopsis.text: Battle and magic collide in 15th-century France during the Hundred Years' War against England. Amidst the turmoil, Montmorency, a noble's son, dedicates himself to mastering magic and alchemy at a prestigious knight academy. However, when France faces a devastating loss at Agincourt, the academy is forced to close, leaving Montmorency a wanted man and a fugitive. His journey takes a turn when he crosses paths with Jeanne, an enigmatic village girl, forever changing their destinies. Join Montmorency and Jeanne as they navigate the challenges of war, magic, and mystery in this thrilling anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
